messages.zh: 第二十五关（后）
messages.en: level 25(post)

messages.zh: ......走！快撤！这个矿场不能再呆下去了！
messages.en: ……Go! Let’s move! We can’t stay here anymore!

messages.zh: 发生什么了？！
messages.en: What’s happening?!

messages.zh: 是罗德岛的进攻！我们被袭击了！
messages.en: It’s Rhodes Island! We’re under attack!
—————Bastard————

messages.zh: 不要慌张，组织大家进行反击！
messages.en: Don’t panic, assemble everyone for a counterattack!

messages.zh: 碎骨......我们可以和罗德岛......
messages.en: Bone Breaker……we can still……

messages.zh: ——怎么？要我和罗德岛谈谈？
messages.en: ——What? You want me to talk with Rhodes Island?

messages.zh: 他们一定会帮助感染者的。
messages.en: They will help the Infected too.

messages.zh: 那么多同胞都死在罗德岛手上，你让我和他们谈谈——？
messages.en: So many of our kins died in the hands of Rhodes Island, and you want me to talk with them——?

messages.zh: 他们都是感染者，罗德岛帮助他们了吗？
messages.en: They’re all Infected here, has Rhodes Island helped them?

messages.zh: 究竟是什么东西蒙蔽了你的双眼？！
messages.en: What is it that is clouding your eyes?!

messages.zh: 感染者好不容易拥有了一丝希望。
messages.en: The Infected finally has a sliver of hope now.

messages.zh: 他们作为感染者，却在这个时候来伤害我们，屠杀我们。
messages.en: They, being Infected as well, choose to harm us and slaughter us at this time.

messages.zh: 你打算和叛徒谈什么呢？！
messages.en: What words do you want to have with traitors?!

messages.zh: 感染者就一定要自相残杀吗？
messages.en: Does the Infected have to kill each other?

messages.zh: 那我该怎么办呢......
messages.en: What should I do then……

messages.zh: 难道要我任由同胞死去吗？
messages.en: Should I just let my kins die?

messages.zh: 没事的。
messages.en: It’s okay.

messages.zh: 哪怕你被他们抓到也不会受到伤害。你对他们而言还有利用价值......
messages.en: You won’t get hurt even if you got caught by them. You’re still of use to them……

messages.zh: 保护好自己，别被战斗波及。
messages.en: Keep yourself safe, don’t get caught in the battle.

messages.zh: 千万要小心......
messages.en: Do be careful……
You……have to come back……

messages.zh: 我好不容易才......
messages.en: I’ve finally……’

messages.zh: 嗯，我会回来找你的。
messages.en: Yea, I’ll come back for you.

messages.zh: 到时候，我们一起回家——
messages.en: After that, we’ll go back home together——
……Yea.

messages.zh: 碎骨，我和你说过吧？
messages.en: Bone Breaker, remember what I’ve told you?
……I do.

messages.zh: ——只要干掉那个目标，战局就能瞬间逆转。
messages.en: ——If I take out that target, the battle can be turned around instantly.

messages.zh: 没错哦。杀死敌方指挥官——很简单吧。
messages.en: That’s right. Killing the enemies’ commander——very easy right.

messages.zh: 就是兔子身边那个，带着兜帽的家伙。
messages.en: Right beside the bunny, the one in a hood.

messages.zh: 罗德岛所有的战斗都是这个家伙在指挥。
messages.en: All of Rhodes Island’s battles are commanded by this guy.

messages.zh: 只要杀掉这个指挥官，喀！
messages.en: If you kill this commander, ka-cha!

messages.zh: 罗德岛的大脑就坏死了。
messages.en: Rhodes Island’s brain dies.

messages.zh: 什么会变得简单的~
messages.en: Everything will become easy~

messages.zh: 我们的人不多了，可用的战术也很少。
messages.en: We don’t have many people left, and there are few tactics we can choose from.

messages.zh: 在矿场前面有一个很好的埋伏圈。我这里的术师会帮你做些掩护——你知道该做什么吧？
messages.en: There’s a good spot for ambush just ahead of the mine. My casters here will do some covering for you——you know what to do right?

messages.zh: 我的部下会把他们引过来的。好好把握这个机会~
messages.en: My secondaries will lure them over. Take good hold of this chance~

messages.zh: 我明白。
messages.en: I know.

messages.zh: ——帮我照顾好米莎。
messages.en: ——Take care of Misha for me.

messages.zh: 没问题~那么，祝你好运！
messages.en: No problem~good luck to you then!
